__e: Who wasn't absent from school at least once, right?

Now, Mike, I know you skipped school and went to that trial.
Where is my father? 11 years I've been here, and he's never missed a shift.
I've known you since we were five and you have never walked out of class.
I am left with no choice but to tell you what I would have preferred not to voice.
Now, I'll check in with you later..
I can't remember the last time he missed a day.
But as a father, he never missed a birthday a ballgame.
By selling my boat, which belongs to me, which used to belong to us but you missed the divorce so now it belongs to me.

Never turned up to school one day, was seen on the train with an overnight bag.
